column1: Golasgil was the lord of Anfalas during the War of the Ring.
Golasgil led a long line of men to Minas Tirith before the Battle of Pelennor Fields.  All that he commanded - hunters
column3: and villagers - were scantily equipped save for his own household.  However
column4: since he was not mentioned among the fallen in the Song of the Mounds of Mundburg it appears that he did survive the great battle.

column1: Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings
